Html: Any plans to style the DatePicker control? It's not bad on a light theme, but stands out a bit on the dark theme.
Wow! That was fast! Thanks, love it.

Any idea for TimePicker control?

Thanks ^^

There's no TimePicker control in the core WPF controls. The idea is to make sure MUI doesn't have any dependencies other than the BCL.

Just an idea: custom styled controls could be made available in some sort of external mui contrib project.
Yes I like your idea. I am currently looking for a mui style for the decimalupdown control.. and if I don't come across one in the next week or so I'm gonna write one :)
